TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Howak, title = Howak, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Howak} }

S.FORM: Howak Itiniay i Donghe Cen no Taitung ko Howak a niyaro', 342 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 471 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 23% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 106 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 77% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 365 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 22%.

Howak Itiniay i Donghe Cen no Taitong ko Howak a niyaro', 342 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 471 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 23% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 106 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 77% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 365 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 22%.
